item.title: Report X-2024010724
item.description:
Report X-2024010724

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-06T18:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-02
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: MANGER NOTIFIED QA OF THE LEAKING PACKAGE. QA PLACED THE LEAKING PACKAGE IN A LINED TOTE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: THE CONTAINER HAD A LOOSE CAP AND LEAKED OUT SOILING THE BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2024020011
item.description:
Report X-2024020011

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-06T18:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-23
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP. DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART TO THE LEAKER. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER CONSULTED THE DECSION TREE ON HOW TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. FOLLOWING GUIDLINES IN DECSION TREE RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL AND BROUGHT BACK LEAKER TO DMP. LEAKER WAS PROPERLY DISPOSED OF.
